paragraphs.title: Collaborative Filtering:  Alternating Least Squares Matrix Factorization
Use The Historical Data For Model Training (80%) And Testing (20%)
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.ALS
import org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating

val ratings = ratingsDF.map(rating => 
  Rating(rating(0).asInstanceOf[Int], rating(1).asInstanceOf[Int], 1)
)

val splitRatings = ratings.randomSplit(Array(1.0,0.0))	
val (trainingRatings, testingRatings) = (splitRatings(0), splitRatings(1))
trainingRatings.cache()
testingRatings.cache()

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.ALS
import org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating
ratings: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating] = MapPartitionsRDD[858] at map at <console>:78
splitRatings: Array[org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating]] = Array(MapPartitionsRDD[859] at randomSplit at <console>:80, MapPartitionsRDD[860] at randomSplit at <console>:80)
trainingRatings: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating] = MapPartitionsRDD[859] at randomSplit at <console>:80
testingRatings: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.recommendation.Rating] = MapPartitionsRDD[860] at randomSplit at <console>:80
res119: trainingRatings.type = MapPartitionsRDD[859] at randomSplit at <console>:80
res120: testingRatings.type = MapPartitionsRDD[860] at randomSplit at <console>:80

paragraphs.title: Train The Model Using The Historical Training Split Of The Historical Data
paragraphs.text:
val rank = 10
val numIterations = 20
val convergenceThreshold = 0.01

val model = ALS.train(trainingRatings, rank, numIterations, convergenceThreshold)

numIterations: Int = 20
convergenceThreshold: Double = 0.01

defined class Recommendation

       	case Row(recommendations: Seq[Row]) => recommendations.map(recommendation => 
                                  ^
enrichedRecommendationsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [fromuserid: int, touserid: int, name: string, bio: string, img: string, confidence: double]

paragraphs.text:
import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._ 
import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode

val esConfig = Map("pushdown" -> "true", "es.nodes" -> "demo.fluxcapacitor.com", "es.port" -> "39200")
enrichedRecommendationsDF.write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql").mode(SaveMode.Overwrite).options(esConfig).save("fluxcapacitor/personalized-als")

result.msg:
import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode
esConfig: scala.collection.immutable.Map[String,String] = Map(pushdown -> true, es.nodes -> demo.fluxcapacitor.com, es.port -> 39200)
